analysis.key_quote: Implementing Schedule Policy/Career (formerly Schedule F) would politicize the Civil Service, jeopardize national security, eliminate due process protections, enable political purges, deter top talent, undermine evidence-based policy, and degrade public trust.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, loss of due process protections, and the degradation of the merit-based civil service system, indicating a strong stance against the implementation of Schedule F.
